description.p: This stable release fixes the following bugs:

ul.li: False OCP triggered when transition from high current to low current under 100% load conitions.
Firmware OCP does not perform as expected.
Port ignoring unrecognized message instead of sending REJECT message in PD2 mode.
Port sends "Not_Supported" instead of Reject for DR_SWAP to UFP request in PD3 mode.
Port not responding with NAK when tester sends invalid Discover Identity request message with SVID-0xEEEE in PD2 mode.
Port not responding with NAK when tester sends valid Discover Identity request in PD2 mode.
Port was not a Vconn Source provider when talking to cable in PD2 mode.
Extended message header size was not 25 bytes which is mandated by PD Spec Rev3.1 v 1.1.
Error recovery details read from register 0x40 always returns 0 for bits 22-27 when EC receives power event occurred interrupt from register 0x14.
Port does not assert Billboard event when AM entry fails.
Incorrect number of VDOs sent for Discover Identity Message when in UFP Role.
